Posts.Content: Devilwearspink wrote: I had a core needle biopsy 3 days ago and I’m waiting for test results. I have some concerns about 1. The pain radiating down my arm on the side I received the biopsy. I’ve had issues with that arm going numb or pain. They actually tested me for MS because of it so I’m unsure if that’s normal. 2. My other concern is against doctors suggestion I put my nipple ring back in (he suggested I wait a week). It wasn’t slightly closed on one sid but I often had issues putting it back in before. However this time I got really hot, light headed and Nausous. I’m now experiencing sharp pain in my nipple. I’m curious if anyone else had this issue or if it should be cause for concern. I also took off my sports bra for the first time right after to attempt to shower. So I don’t know what know if it’s just pain because of gravety. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Nipple piercing & other pain Devilwearspink Moderators
